actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.

official_title: To award a congressional gold medal to Margaret Thatcher, in recognition of her dedication to the values of free markets and free minds.
short_title: Margaret Thatcher Congressional Gold Medal Act
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Margaret Thatcher Congressional Gold Medal Act - Provides for the presentation of a congressional gold medal to Margaret Thatcher in recognition of her dedication to the values of free markets and free minds.

titles.title: Margaret Thatcher Congressional Gold Medal Act
To award a congressional gold medal to Margaret Thatcher, in recognition of her dedication to the values of free markets and free minds.
